01

About

How do we help
Asset Managers

Take your investment analysis to the next level with US Stock Insights by Investment Analytics. Our research service provides you with interactive reports, updated every week, on 1000 US Stocks. With our enhanced factor-analysis framework, you'll gain insights into the most investment philosophies. Plus, our automated ranking system helps you identify opportunities quickly and efficiently.

Savings in equity
research resources

Our solution helps asset managers achieve better economies of scale and material savings in equity research resources.

Advanced
Technology

Our enhanced factor-analysis framework generates insights for most investment philosophies.

Industry
Expertise

Our team of experts provides you with comprehensive research on 1000 US Stocks, updated every week.

Customer-Centric
Approach

By automating tedious tasks, our solution gives you more time to focus on high-value activities and leverage your soft skills.

stocks, indexes and sectors

Why a Factor Investment Framework?

Factor investment has be backed by Nobel Laureates Multi-factor can consistently integrate Fundamental Analysis, Technical Analysis & Risk Management.

Features

Why US companies?

03

Insights

Advanced Investment Research and Analysis

Our platform provides investment managers with a comprehensive suite of tools and analytics, including proprietary 360-degree analysis and smart portfolio building, to inform and optimize investment decisions.

  • Stock Rankings
  • 360 Degree Analysis
  • Custom Index Analytics
  • Smart Portfolio Builder

Comprehensive Stock Rankings and Analysis

Our stock rankings provide a detailed assessment of each stock's performance, including:

  • Performance metrics
  • Risk metrics
  • Flow dynamics
  • Profit sensitivity
  • Earnings stability
  • Factor analysis
  • Sector and industry classification
  • External factor analysis

In-Depth Stock Analysis and Insights

Our proprietary 360-degree analysis provides a comprehensive view of each stock, including:

  • Fundamental analysis
  • Short-term analysis
  • Flows analysis
  • Peer analysis
  • GenAI narrative
  • Quality analysis
  • Risk analysis
  • Detailed growth dynamics
  • Main valuation models

Advanced Index Analysis and Customization

Our custom market weighted index analytics enable you to:

  • Screen for top-performing indexes
  • Analyze index segments
  • Create and analyze custom indexes
  • Access detailed market weighted analytics and composites

Portfolio Optimization and Construction

Our smart portfolio builder enables you to:

  • Select top-ranked stocks by investment philosophy
  • Customize industry exposure
  • Automate analysis of each security, sector, and basket
